item.description:
Rock for a Cause, 80s Style
with the Junior League of Worcester
Host: Junior League of Worcester
Type: Causes - Fundraiser
Network: Global
Date: Friday, April 30, 2010
Time: 7:00pm - 11:00pm
Location: Coral Seafood
Street: 225 Shrewsbury Street
City/Town: Worcester, MA
View Map
Make a difference. Forget an ordinary night out to dinner - here is an event you don't want to miss. Rock for a Cause, 80s Style with the Junior League of Worcester and support the projects that help the women and children in need within our community. We'll be there - Purple rain or shine!

Featuring:
80s Dance Music by DJ Bobby'D, Cocktails available at the cash bar,Silent Auction, Wine Raffle,50/50 Cash Raffle and MORE!

Tickets $20 (purchase online at www.jlwma.org, or ask your favorite Junior League Member)
Want to be bad to the bone? Reserve a VIP table for 10 of your choice friends for only $200! Tubluar, fer shur!

Please visit www.jlwma.org or email rockforacause@jlwma.org for more information.
item.name: Rock For A Cause!
